snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『東方スカーレットディアブロ』| Touhou Scarlet Diablo Fantastica for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
Touhou Scarlet Diabolique Fantastica for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1
Genre: Shooter
Monitor: Vertical (Recommended), Horizontal
Languages: English, Japanese

FEATURES

4 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
The legendary Touhou series finally comes to the arcade in a full fledged vertical shooter! Choose from series veterans, Reimu and Marisa, along with fan favorites, Sanae and Patchouli.

3 PLAY MODES
ORIGINAL
EXTRA
SCORE ATTACK
Play through the Original story mode in 4 difficulty levels. Challenge the epilogue in Extra and practice any stage in Score Attack to discover the truth behind the mysterious red mist!

2 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE – more than twice as fast as the original version
Maximum Performance! Play like you’re meant to. Never get hit again.

2 SOUNDTRACKS
ORIGINAL – the original game soundtrack
ARRANGED – the new acclaimed arranged soundtrack composed by Keishi Yonao

NEW CHARACTER VOICES
Every character is fully voiced by renowned anime voice actors!

CAST
REIMU – AYAKA SUWA
MARISA – NAOMI OHZORA
SANAE – KANAE ITO
PATCHOULI – ASAMI SANADA
and more

OPERATE IN LANDSCAPE OR PORTRAIT
Works in either screen orientation (vertical or horizontal).

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3wSiFal
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
縦スクロールシューティング
『東方スカーレットディアブロ』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/3TyjHkn
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 40 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA


Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica | Attract Video | exA-Arcadia
https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia
